button.network_not_supported: You need to be connected to {expectedChainName} to perform this action

wrong_network.message: You need to be connected to {expectedChainName} to use this app, but you are currently connected to {currentChainName}.
wrong_network.message_unknown_network: You need to be connected to {expectedChainName} to use this app, please switch your network to continue.

options.desktop: You can use the {metamask_link} extension or your email account
options.mobile: You can use mobile browsers such as {coinbase_link} or {imtoken_link}.

modal.title: Sign In
modal.subtitle: Choose how you want to connect to Ethereum.
modal.supported_wallets: Trezor and smart contract wallets like Dapper, Argent or Gnosis safe, do not work with Polygon. Read more about the Trezor support status {trezor_link}

option.mobile_and_browser: Using your mobile or browser extension

modal.title: Buy MANA
modal.subtitle: Select what MANA you want to buy:

pending.title: Buy {network} MANA
pending.description: Wait a few minutes while the transaction is being processed

success.title: {network} MANA purchase completed!
success.description: The {network} MANA has been added to your account. If you still don't see it in your balance, refresh this page.

failure.title: Buy {network} MANA
failure.description: You can try again with {gateway} or select other provider

ethereum.ctaSubtitle: Use it to buy LAND, names and specific wearables in Ethereum.
ethereum.title: Buy Ethereum MANA

moonPay.title: Buy Ethereum MANA with MoonPay
moonPay.subtitle: You can buy with debit and credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or via bank transfer.

transak.title: Buy Ethereum MANA with Transak
transak.subtitle: You can buy with debit and credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or via bank transfer.

matic.ctaSubtitle: Use it to buy most wearables and emotes in Polygon.
matic.title: Buy Polygon MANA

moonPay.title: Buy Polygon MANA with MoonPay
moonPay.subtitle: You can buy with debit and credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or via bank transfer.

transak.title: Buy Polygon MANA with Transak
transak.subtitle: You can buy with debit and credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or via bank transfer.

contract_account_error.title: Wallet not supported
contract_account_error.body: Smart contract wallets are not supported for meta-transactions. You can switch your network to Polygon and send a regular transaction.

invalid_address_error.title: Invalid address
invalid_address_error.body: The contract address is not available for meta-transactions. You can switch your network to Polygon and send a regular transaction.

sale_price_too_low_error.title: Price too low
sale_price_too_low_error.body: The price is too low for this meta-transaction. You can switch your network to Polygon and send a regular transaction.

unknown_error.title: Something went wrong
unknown_error.body: There was an unexpected error sending the meta-transaction. You can switch your network to Polygon and try sending a regular transaction.

high_congestion_error.title: High congestion
high_congestion_error.body: Polygon Network gas prices are too high! Please wait and try again later, or switch your Network to Polygon and pay for the gas fee with MATIC.

network_alert.title: Your wallet is connected to Polygon
network_alert.content: Use this network to cover the gas of a transaction (like when buying items below 1 MANA). Switch back when you finish. <link>Learn more</link>

authorization_modal.waiting_wallet: Confirm the transaction on your wallet
authorization_modal.title: Complete your {action}
authorization_modal.spending_cap_error: Remember to set a cap equal to the item price {price} MANA or higher.
authorization_modal.revoke_cap_error: Remember to set a spending cap of 0 MANA in order to revoke your previous one.

insufficient_amount_error.message: Your spending cap is not enough to cover the purchase amount of {price} MANA. To proceed, please adjust your spending cap equal or higher. Revoke the current spending cap and retry with an appropriate limit.

authorize_mana.title: First, authorize the <contract></contract> contract to operate MANA on your behalf in Decentraland.
authorize_mana.description: Keep in mind that some wallets require setting a custom MANA spending limit. Enter the item price {price} MANA or a higher amount you're comfortable with for spending now or later. You can change the limit at any time.
authorize_mana.message: Remember to set a cap equal to the item price {price} MANA or higher.

authorize_nft.title: First, authorize the <contract></contract> contract to operate your <targetContract></targetContract> NFTs on your behalf in Decentraland

revoke_cap.title: Revoke your current spending cap
revoke_cap.description: Your current spending cap is lower than {price} MANA. You'll have to revoke your current spending cap before making a new one.

set_cap.title: Set a new spending cap
set_cap.description: Enter the item price {price} MANA or a higher amount you're comfortable with for spending now or later. You can change the limit at any time.
